programme.title: Premijer
programme.desc: Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Prije političkog angažiranja, malo je bio poznat u narodu, bavio se književnošću i narodnim umotvorinama. Čak ni televizija koja 2015. godine objavljuje rezultate izbora nije imala njegovu sliku. Međutim, kada je postao premijer, malo-pomalo, bivao je simpatičan običnom narodu. Umjesto napisanih političkih govora, on je govorio prosto, služeći se izrekama i tako postao vrlo popularan lik, omiljen u narodu. PREMIJER je sitkom serija na temu lica i naličja politike i političara. Junaci PREMIJERA iza viskokih državnih funkcija kriju ljudske mane i vrline, i mi pokušavamo, u neskrivenom nušićevskom maniru, da iznesemo pred gledatelji smiješnu a ponekad i gorku stranu osobnosti onih koji odlučuju o sudbini naroda i zemlje.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Dogodovštine jedne beogradske porodice dočaraće otac Mića i majka Vera, koji su razvedeni, ali igrom slučaja, prisiljeni živeti pod istim krovom sa dve ćerke. Brak je kad dvoje ljudi zajedno rešavaju probleme koje nikad ne bi imali da nisu zajedno...oni se stalno svađaju, ali ne bi valjalo da je drugačije...oni su razdvojeni, ali žive u istom stanu...oni su sretni u svađama, neverovatni u neurozi i nemoćni smisliti argument za svoje ili tuđe ponašanje...kada ljubav postane navika da li sve postaje panika...Dogodovštine jedne beogradske porodice dočaraće otac Mića i majka Vera, koji su razvedeni, ali igrom slučaja, prisiljeni živeti pod istim krovom sa dve ćerke - studentkinjom Majom i srednjoškolkom Janjom. S obzirom da je majka psihijatarkinja, kroz njihovu kuću prolazi paleta različitih pacijenata, a nerazdvojni deo porodičnog miljea je i komšija Jovanović, koji samo na izgled deluje nervozno, a u stvari tvrdi da je najnormalniji od cele porodice.

programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Premijer
programme.desc: Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Prije političkog angažiranja, malo je bio poznat u narodu, bavio se književnošću i narodnim umotvorinama. Čak ni televizija koja 2015. godine objavljuje rezultate izbora nije imala njegovu sliku. Međutim, kada je postao premijer, malo-pomalo, bivao je simpatičan običnom narodu. Umjesto napisanih političkih govora, on je govorio prosto, služeći se izrekama i tako postao vrlo popularan lik, omiljen u narodu. PREMIJER je sitkom serija na temu lica i naličja politike i političara. Junaci PREMIJERA iza viskokih državnih funkcija kriju ljudske mane i vrline, i mi pokušavamo, u neskrivenom nušićevskom maniru, da iznesemo pred gledatelji smiješnu a ponekad i gorku stranu osobnosti onih koji odlučuju o sudbini naroda i zemlje.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Iako su razvedeni, prisiljeni su živjeti pod istim krovom, a tu dolazi do brojnih rasprava i svađa.

Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Iako su razvedeni, prisiljeni su živjeti pod istim krovom, a tu dolazi do brojnih rasprava i svađa.

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca,... Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Premijer
programme.desc: Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Prije političkog angažiranja, malo je bio poznat u narodu, bavio se književnošću i narodnim umotvorinama. Čak ni televizija koja 2015. godine objavljuje rezultate izbora nije imala njegovu sliku. Međutim, kada je postao premijer, malo-pomalo, bivao je simpatičan običnom narodu. Umjesto napisanih političkih govora, on je govorio prosto, služeći se izrekama i tako postao vrlo popularan lik, omiljen u narodu. PREMIJER je sitkom serija na temu lica i naličja politike i političara. Junaci PREMIJERA iza viskokih državnih funkcija kriju ljudske mane i vrline, i mi pokušavamo, u neskrivenom nušićevskom maniru, da iznesemo pred gledatelji smiješnu a ponekad i gorku stranu osobnosti onih koji odlučuju o sudbini naroda i zemlje.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Dogodovštine jedne beogradske porodice dočaraće otac Mića i majka Vera, koji su razvedeni, ali igrom slučaja, prisiljeni živeti pod istim krovom sa dve ćerke. Brak je kad dvoje ljudi zajedno rešavaju probleme koje nikad ne bi imali da nisu zajedno...oni se stalno svađaju, ali ne bi valjalo da je drugačije...oni su razdvojeni, ali žive u istom stanu...oni su sretni u svađama, neverovatni u neurozi i nemoćni smisliti argument za svoje ili tuđe ponašanje...kada ljubav postane navika da li sve postaje panika...Dogodovštine jedne beogradske porodice dočaraće otac Mića i majka Vera, koji su razvedeni, ali igrom slučaja, prisiljeni živeti pod istim krovom sa dve ćerke - studentkinjom Majom i srednjoškolkom Janjom. S obzirom da je majka psihijatarkinja, kroz njihovu kuću prolazi paleta različitih pacijenata, a nerazdvojni deo porodičnog miljea je i komšija Jovanović, koji samo na izgled deluje nervozno, a u stvari tvrdi da je najnormalniji od cele porodice.

programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca,... Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Premijer
programme.desc: Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Prije političkog angažiranja, malo je bio poznat u narodu, bavio se književnošću i narodnim umotvorinama. Čak ni televizija koja 2015. godine objavljuje rezultate izbora nije imala njegovu sliku. Međutim, kada je postao premijer, malo-pomalo, bivao je simpatičan običnom narodu. Umjesto napisanih političkih govora, on je govorio prosto, služeći se izrekama i tako postao vrlo popularan lik, omiljen u narodu. PREMIJER je sitkom serija na temu lica i naličja politike i političara. Junaci PREMIJERA iza viskokih državnih funkcija kriju ljudske mane i vrline, i mi pokušavamo, u neskrivenom nušićevskom maniru, da iznesemo pred gledatelji smiješnu a ponekad i gorku stranu osobnosti onih koji odlučuju o sudbini naroda i zemlje.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Iako su razvedeni, prisiljeni su živjeti pod istim krovom, a tu dolazi do brojnih rasprava i svađa.

Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: Dramska serija Ljubav u zaleđu obiteljska je priča čija se radnja odvija u prepoznatljivoj zagrebačkoj urbanoj sredini. U središtu priče dva su naraštaja triju obitelji povezanih nogometom. Dramska serija Ljubav u zaleđu obiteljska je priča čija se radnja odvija u prepoznatljivoj zagrebačkoj urbanoj sredini. U središtu priče dva su naraštaja triju obitelji povezanih nogometom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz nogomet. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao nogometaši, jedan je postao uspješan trener, a posljednji je u menedžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane. Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovno u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže nogomet i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Usporedno pratimo i živote njihove djece, koji su odrastali pod utjecajem nogometa, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je, dakako, ljubav dvoje mladih, nogometaša Marka Marušića i slikarice Nine Radić. Njihova je ljubavna priča puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

programme.title: Premijer
programme.desc: Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Prije političkog angažiranja, malo je bio poznat u narodu, bavio se književnošću i narodnim umotvorinama. Čak ni televizija koja 2015. godine objavljuje rezultate izbora nije imala njegovu sliku. Međutim, kada je postao premijer, malo-pomalo, bivao je simpatičan običnom narodu. Umjesto napisanih političkih govora, on je govorio prosto, služeći se izrekama i tako postao vrlo popularan lik, omiljen u narodu. PREMIJER je sitkom serija na temu lica i naličja politike i političara. Junaci PREMIJERA iza viskokih državnih funkcija kriju ljudske mane i vrline, i mi pokušavamo, u neskrivenom nušićevskom maniru, da iznesemo pred gledatelji smiješnu a ponekad i gorku stranu osobnosti onih koji odlučuju o sudbini naroda i zemlje.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Iako su razvedeni, prisiljeni su živjeti pod istim krovom, a tu dolazi do brojnih rasprava i svađa.

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca,... Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: All About Steve
Sve o Steveu
programme.desc:
All About Steve: Directed by Phil Traill. With Sandra Bullock, Thomas Haden Church, Bradley Cooper, Ken Jeong. Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0881891/","name":"All About Steve","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA5MTQxOTE2OTReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY5NzI4NzI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002006/","name":"Thomas Haden Church"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1288766/","name":"Phil Traill"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0241738/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2184890/","name":"Kim Barker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"All About Steve: Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1841496857","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5MDM3OTI5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTgxODQyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5MDM3OTI5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTgxODQyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Convinced that a CNN cameraman (Cooper) is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler (Bullock) trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together. "},"datePublished":"2009-09-04","description":"Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.","keywords":"asperger's syndrome,short skirt with boots,hot legs,woman wearing a mini skirt,fall","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0881891/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bopdog"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"I was delighted and uplifted. Sandra Bullock has real charm and grace, and this movie brightly showcases that","reviewBody":"Reading some critics' reviews, and the online IMDb votes, I was expecting a really bad movie. I was shocked to find not only a NOT bad movie. and not only an "OK" movie, but what, for me, was a really great movie! Of course I am a solid Sandra Bullock fan. I thought this movie took some interesting elements (Thomas Hayden Church's characters, for example, are usually so smarmy and sleazy they are unpleasant to see, especially given that he is such a good actor, he pulls the worst out of his characters), and played them together very well.

Fortunately, we don't all admire or like the same things in the opposite sex. What many often cluck over in celebrity ladies often leaves me cold, feeling as if I had brushed up against a self-absorbed block of ice. Bullock's on-screen persona is always a warm, earthy, personable sort. Matey. Chummy. It's the films, of course, so her traits are artificially heightened, but I LIKE those kinds of women in the real world. From all that I hear and have seen over the years, Bullock seems to be the real deal--- her on-screen persona is not terribly far from her real life personality. Whatever... but the point is that she brings a loveliness and kindness to her roles that I enjoy.

The critics have been unfairly beating up on this movie, I think. Granted, it's a rom-com, and a bit silly, but if I wanted hard-core reality, or gritty tragedy, I'd watch the news, or "Schindler's List" or something. I'd stay home and stare at my friends, or in the mirror, for free. I want to be delighted and uplifted at the cinema, and this film did exactly that. Hurray for Sandra Bullock and the "All About Steve" production team!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":40199,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Directed by Brian Levant. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Phil Hartman, Rita Wilson. A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

","datePublished":"2009-09-04","description":"Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.","keywords":"asperger's syndrome,short skirt with boots,hot legs,woman wearing a mini skirt,fall","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0881891/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bopdog","dateCreated":"2009-09-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"I was delighted and uplifted. Sandra Bullock has real charm and grace, and this movie brightly showcases that","reviewBody":"Reading some critics' reviews, and the online IMDb votes, I was expecting a really bad movie. I was shocked to find not only a NOT bad movie. and not only an "OK" movie, but what, for me, was a really great movie! Of course I am a solid Sandra Bullock fan. I thought this movie took some interesting elements (Thomas Hayden Church's characters, for example, are usually so smarmy and sleazy they are unpleasant to see, especially given that he is such a good actor, he pulls the worst out of his characters), and played them together very well.

Fortunately, we don't all admire or like the same things in the opposite sex. What many often cluck over in celebrity ladies often leaves me cold, feeling as if I had brushed up against a self-absorbed block of ice. Bullock's on-screen persona is always a warm, earthy, personable sort. Matey. Chummy. It's the films, of course, so her traits are artificially heightened, but I LIKE those kinds of women in the real world. From all that I hear and have seen over the years, Bullock seems to be the real deal--- her on-screen persona is not terribly far from her real life personality. Whatever... but the point is that she brings a loveliness and kindness to her roles that I enjoy.

The critics have been unfairly beating up on this movie, I think. Granted, it's a rom-com, and a bit silly, but if I wanted hard-core reality, or gritty tragedy, I'd watch the news, or "Schindler's List" or something. I'd stay home and stare at my friends, or in the mirror, for free. I want to be delighted and uplifted at the cinema, and this film did exactly that. Hurray for Sandra Bullock and the "All About Steve" production team!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":40199,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8,"duration":"PT1H39M"</script><metacontent="

Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0329774/","name":"xXx: State of the Union","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4ZGQ2OGItNGQ4NC00MWVmLTgxMzktYThjNmRlNjYzYjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001084/","name":"Ice Cube"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848414/","name":"Lee Tamahori"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx: State of the Union","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2080309529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"datePublished":"2005-04-27","description":"Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States.","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,slow motion scene,spy,stabbing,reference to johnnie cochran","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0329774/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kriticalreview"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"cookie cutter plot","reviewBody":"Saw a screening of it today,...and probably wished I didn't agree to watch it,.. Anyways, I don't even know where to begin so here goes: Plot/action: The usual cliché plot line that involves government agency coverups, bad blood, and conspiracies to kill the President. I thought the first 'XXX' was OK, but the plot of 'XXX2' is so unoriginal and narrow-minded it makes the first one seem like an epic. The action and stunts aren't even imaginative,.. seems like even money can't buy a good movie because even the fight scenes are uninspiring,..kind of reminds me of Steven Seagal movies where you're even hoping that the main character gets his ass kicked Characters: Ice Cube playing his usual badass self, although the release of this movie is in such close proximity to 'are we there yet?' that it almost seems like him and Vin Diesel (The Pacifier) have teamed up secretly to harm America with such bad movies. Overall, I think that Ice Cube's character lacks the edge of Vin Diesel in the first installment. The other characters in this movie including the main badguy (Willem Dafoe) are cardboard thin leading you to wonder as the movie goes along if the plot development will be just as bad.\n\nOverall Entertainment Value: 4/10,..I feel that the movie would have been better if they eased up on the whole government agency conspiracy aspect and focused more on stunts, which made the first one much more easy to watch","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68121,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

"},"datePublished":"2011-04-29","description":"Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.","keywords":"heist,safe,rio de janeiro brazil,leg,policewoman","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1596343/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CMTiago"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fast Five: The Big Climax Of The Franchise","reviewBody":"Without a shadow of a doubt, The Fast And Furious Franchise reaches it's peak in this installment with breathtaking action and a sense of friendship and brotherhood shared by the lead characters. Vin Diesel and Paul Walker return and are joined by newcomer Dwayne Johnsson for the 5th Fast and Furious Movie, entitled ''Fast Five''. There's not much to say about this, the action movie of the year, except it's fantastic shots of Brazil, the heist plot that brings even more excitem«ent to the table and overall the continuation of the story of these characters we have come to love and support, as their bond streghtens over time.

In Conclusion, if you love the franchise then you can't miss it

programme.title: Zlatni kompas
programme.desc: Dvanaestogodišnja Lyra Belacqua (Dakota Blue Richards) krenula je u potragu za svojom najboljom prijateljicom, a završit će u misiji spašavanja svijeta, i to ne samo svoga. Snimljena prema prvom dijelu nagrađivane trilogije Philipa Pullmana "Njegove tamne tvari", smještena u paralelni svemir gdje se znanost isprepleće s magijom. Dvanaestogodišnja Lyra Belacqua (D. Blue Richards) hita u pomoć svom najboljem prijatelju, no naposljetku se nađe u veličanstvenoj misiji da spasi ne samo svoj svijet nego i naš i sve ostale svjetove...

"},"datePublished":"2011-04-29","description":"Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.","keywords":"heist,safe,rio de janeiro brazil,leg,policewoman","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1596343/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CMTiago"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fast Five: The Big Climax Of The Franchise","reviewBody":"Without a shadow of a doubt, The Fast And Furious Franchise reaches it's peak in this installment with breathtaking action and a sense of friendship and brotherhood shared by the lead characters. Vin Diesel and Paul Walker return and are joined by newcomer Dwayne Johnsson for the 5th Fast and Furious Movie, entitled ''Fast Five''. There's not much to say about this, the action movie of the year, except it's fantastic shots of Brazil, the heist plot that brings even more excitem«ent to the table and overall the continuation of the story of these characters we have come to love and support, as their bond streghtens over time.

In Conclusion, if you love the franchise then you can't miss it

9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":359999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hotel Grand Budapest
programme.desc: Smješten u okvire svijeta koji se dramatično mijenja između dva rata, film prepričava pustolovine Gustavea, legendarnoga konsijerža slavnog europskog hotela i Zeroa, hotelskoga potrčka. HOTEL GRAND BUDAPEST prepričava pustolovine Gustavea H., legendarnog konsijerža slavnog europskog hotela između dva rata, i Zeroa Moustafe, hotelskoga potrčka koji mu postane najvjerniji prijatelj. Priča uključuje krađu i pronalazak neprocjenjive renesansne slike, bitku oko golemog obiteljskog imetka, očajničku jurnjavu na motociklima, vlakovima, sanjkama i skijama te najslađu ljubavnu aferu - sve u okviru naglih i dramatičnih promjena na Starome kontinentu.

But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.","keywords":"folklore,excalibur,tyrant,knights of the round table,historical fiction","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1972591/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"King Arthur","reviewBody":"Let's be clear: this contains very few aspects of the actual Arthur legend. They probably should have just gone for a wacky original medieval fantasy film instead. That being said, I didn't expect Ritchie's style to work this well here. And he hasn't been this crazy since Snatch. Some montages are so breathless, fast and innovative as far as editing and soundtrack go, it's a pleasure. Sure, the plot follows the genre conventions more or less, and the finale is a bit heavy on CGI. On the other hand the assassination attempt sequence is fantastic and the portrayal of magic pretty cool. chicken,axe","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0331632/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"psi_fla"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"DOO THE RIGHT THING...","reviewBody":"...and keep this franchise going if you must, Warner Bros., but save it for the kids.

Rating: ** (out of *****)

Let's all rejoin Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang as they try and solve yet another mystery, but with REAL monsters! On second thoughts - let's not.

There is life left in the film world for Scooby-Doo. Honestly, I'm not joking. I acknowledge that the sequel isn't actually that good (I avoided the first one on critical advice) but it would be churlish for me to say it is unbearable. In fact, it's actually watchable to an extent. It's great to look at, and I'll admit to getting a reasonable number of laughs from it. 

 But I still can't recommend the film. It's too childish, doesn't know whether to take itself seriously or not, and above all, is just far too disjointed. Someone should've told the director that the way to approach a film like this is to play it for laughs the whole way through, and have a story that will, in some way, reach out to adults. This is more playground fare than family entertainment. And, on top of all that, it has the wooden Freddie Prinze Jr. as the lead, although thankfully not much is expected of him, or anyone in the cast. Still, blink and you'll miss a wasted Tim Blake Nelson. (You won't miss the latest American Idol, though...)

This is one for the cartoon's audience, children or anyone who's really, really bored and just needs a bit of a laugh. I'm sure it'll really amuse the kids both at home and in the cinema (believe me, nothing will be lost to DVD), although I can't see many of the general public wanting to watch the whole thing again."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51768,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

chicken,axe","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0331632/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"psi_fla","dateCreated":"2004-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"DOO THE RIGHT THING...","reviewBody":"...and keep this franchise going if you must, Warner Bros., but save it for the kids.

Rating: ** (out of *****)

Let's all rejoin Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang as they try and solve yet another mystery, but with REAL monsters! On second thoughts - let's not.

There is life left in the film world for Scooby-Doo. Honestly, I'm not joking. I acknowledge that the sequel isn't actually that good (I avoided the first one on critical advice) but it would be churlish for me to say it is unbearable. In fact, it's actually watchable to an extent. It's great to look at, and I'll admit to getting a reasonable number of laughs from it. 

 But I still can't recommend the film. It's too childish, doesn't know whether to take itself seriously or not, and above all, is just far too disjointed. Someone should've told the director that the way to approach a film like this is to play it for laughs the whole way through, and have a story that will, in some way, reach out to adults. This is more playground fare than family entertainment. And, on top of all that, it has the wooden Freddie Prinze Jr. as the lead, although thankfully not much is expected of him, or anyone in the cast. Still, blink and you'll miss a wasted Tim Blake Nelson. (You won't miss the latest American Idol, though...)

This is one for the cartoon's audience, children or anyone who's really, really bored and just needs a bit of a laugh. I'm sure it'll really amuse the kids both at home and in the cinema (believe me, nothing will be lost to DVD), although I can't see many of the general public wanting to watch the whole thing again.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51768,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

title,1990s,2000s","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0486583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Every Child Deserves a Christmas Gift","reviewBody":"Santa Claus' older brother Fred Claus (Vince Vaughn) was raised in the shadow of his famous brother and has issues with his mother (Kathy Bates). In Chicago, near Christmas, Fred asks for money on the streets trying to raise fifty thousand dollars to open a betting shop. However, many legalized Salvation Army Santa Claus chase him and Fred is arrested and sent to jail. He calls his brother Nick Santa Claus (Paul Giamatti) in the North Pole that accepts to pay his bail of five thousand dollars and proposes to lend the amount Fred needs provided he comes to the North Pole to help him in his factory. Meanwhile the mean efficiency expert Clyde Northcut (Kevin Spacey) arrives in the North Pole with the intention of finding three non-conformities in the audit of the manufacturing process and shut-down the facility. When Fred is assigned to work in the Naughty-Nice Department, the troubles of Nick begin.

I do not recall the last time I have seen such entertaining Christmas movie. "Fred Claus" is funny and has many hilarious moments (my favorite is the siblings-anonymous, with Frank Stallone, Roger Clinton and Stephen Baldwyn among others that resemble Ed Harris, Morgan Freeman and other famous people). The message that there is no naughty child and consequently every child deserves a Christmas gift is great. The cast leaded by Vince Vaughn is fantastic and I really loved this movie. I wish Merry Christmas to all IMDb movie and TV lovers and staff. My vote is seven.

programme.title: A Life Less Ordinary
Sasvim neobičan život
programme.desc: A Life Less Ordinary: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Holly Hunter, Delroy Lindo, Dan Hedaya, Cameron Diaz. Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119535/","name":"A Life Less Ordinary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRiMDhmNTctNGJiYi00MTQ5LTg2N2YtMGQ1NDQyNzU4OWIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ4NDY5OTc@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000191/","name":"Ewan McGregor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103732/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030612/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388076/","name":"John Hodge"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Life Less Ordinary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2511601945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc5NDY4ZDYtN2Q2Zi00MmJhLTk1NjItODM1NWM5YjQ5ODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc5NDY4ZDYtN2Q2Zi00MmJhLTk1NjItODM1NWM5YjQ5ODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"1997-10-24","description":"Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.","keywords":"angel,hostage,kidnapping,robot,janitor","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119535/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Chrysanthepop"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Film Less Ordinary","reviewBody":"Danny Boyle comes up with a charming romantic black comedy. With a fine cast, a fantastic screenplay, a great soundtrack and lots of comedy and some romance, 'A Life Less Ordinary' becomes a not-so-ordinary film. The comedy tracks are very well etched and there are numerous laugh-out-loud moments. However, I also noticed that many people, sadly, did not get most of the jokes. The characters are very unique. After all, where else would you see two cupids committing lots of violence in order to bring two lovers together? Both Holly Hunter and Delroy Lindo are hilarious as the psychotic cupids. The romance track between the freshly paired Ewan McGregor and Cameron Diaz provides another comedic track. They share a great chemistry making the unusual romance between the fiery Celine and the naive Robert very convincing. There's also a brilliant song sequence in which the two actors display their singing talents and dancing skills. Of course, they are supported by talents like Ian Holm and Stanley Tucci who provide excellent comic relief. Hirakubo's sharp editing and Brian Tufano's superb camera-work give the film a slick edge. But it is, John Hodge's tight screenplay and Danny Boyle's direction that superbly balances it all together. You want to see something entertaining but different, 'A Life Less Ordinary' could be the movie you're looking for. It had me laughing from start to end."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34627,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2017038/","name":"All Is Lost","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0MzIyMjU1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTk1MjQxMDE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000602/","name":"Robert Redford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12643903/","name":"Dyapa Gnaneshwar Reddy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1170855/","name":"J.C. Chandor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017716/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0271126/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1170855/","name":"J.C. Chandor"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1966450969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgyNTU0MTMxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjgzMjQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgyNTU0MTMxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjgzMjQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face."},"datePublished":"2013-10-25","description":"After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.","keywords":"one man film,storm,boat,sea,shipping container","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2017038/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"richard_rossi"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"I hope Redford gets Oscar nomination","reviewBody":"Redford is great and this film shows how such a simple idea with one actor can work. As a filmmaker, it was interesting to see how a dialogue-free movie can work visually with a story that reminded me of Hemingway's "The Old Man and the Sea." For me, the story was a metaphor or allegory for life and our struggles. Cinematography was good, shot on the Arri Alexa, one of the hot cameras at the moment. The lack of dialogue and having only one actor made it a meditation for me on the visual elements. I hope Redford gets Oscar nomination. I'm inspired that a veteran like Redford had confidence in Chandor to go on this experimental film journey together.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77486,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

For me, the story was a metaphor or allegory for life and our struggles. Cinematography was good, shot on the Arri Alexa, one of the hot cameras at the moment. The lack of dialogue and having only one actor made it a meditation for me on the visual elements. I hope Redford gets Oscar nomination. title,1990s,2000s","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0486583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Every Child Deserves a Christmas Gift","reviewBody":"Santa Claus' older brother Fred Claus (Vince Vaughn) was raised in the shadow of his famous brother and has issues with his mother (Kathy Bates). In Chicago, near Christmas, Fred asks for money on the streets trying to raise fifty thousand dollars to open a betting shop. However, many legalized Salvation Army Santa Claus chase him and Fred is arrested and sent to jail. He calls his brother Nick Santa Claus (Paul Giamatti) in the North Pole that accepts to pay his bail of five thousand dollars and proposes to lend the amount Fred needs provided he comes to the North Pole to help him in his factory. Meanwhile the mean efficiency expert Clyde Northcut (Kevin Spacey) arrives in the North Pole with the intention of finding three non-conformities in the audit of the manufacturing process and shut-down the facility. When Fred is assigned to work in the Naughty-Nice Department, the troubles of Nick begin.

I do not recall the last time I have seen such entertaining Christmas movie. "Fred Claus" is funny and has many hilarious moments (my favorite is the siblings-anonymous, with Frank Stallone, Roger Clinton and Stephen Baldwyn among others that resemble Ed Harris, Morgan Freeman and other famous people). The message that there is no naughty child and consequently every child deserves a Christmas gift is great. The cast leaded by Vince Vaughn is fantastic and I really loved this movie. I wish Merry Christmas to all IMDb movie and TV lovers and staff. My vote is seven.

programme.title: A Life Less Ordinary
Sasvim neobičan život
programme.desc: A Life Less Ordinary: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Holly Hunter, Delroy Lindo, Dan Hedaya, Cameron Diaz. Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119535/","name":"A Life Less Ordinary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRiMDhmNTctNGJiYi00MTQ5LTg2N2YtMGQ1NDQyNzU4OWIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ4NDY5OTc@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000191/","name":"Ewan McGregor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103732/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030612/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388076/","name":"John Hodge"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Life Less Ordinary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2511601945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc5NDY4ZDYtN2Q2Zi00MmJhLTk1NjItODM1NWM5YjQ5ODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc5NDY4ZDYtN2Q2Zi00MmJhLTk1NjItODM1NWM5YjQ5ODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"1997-10-24","description":"Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.","keywords":"angel,hostage,kidnapping,robot,janitor","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119535/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Chrysanthepop"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Film Less Ordinary","reviewBody":"Danny Boyle comes up with a charming romantic black comedy. With a fine cast, a fantastic screenplay, a great soundtrack and lots of comedy and some romance, 'A Life Less Ordinary' becomes a not-so-ordinary film. The comedy tracks are very well etched and there are numerous laugh-out-loud moments. However, I also noticed that many people, sadly, did not get most of the jokes. The characters are very unique. After all, where else would you see two cupids committing lots of violence in order to bring two lovers together? Both Holly Hunter and Delroy Lindo are hilarious as the psychotic cupids. The romance track between the freshly paired Ewan McGregor and Cameron Diaz provides another comedic track. They share a great chemistry making the unusual romance between the fiery Celine and the naive Robert very convincing. There's also a brilliant song sequence in which the two actors display their singing talents and dancing skills. Of course, they are supported by talents like Ian Holm and Stanley Tucci who provide excellent comic relief. Hirakubo's sharp editing and Brian Tufano's superb camera-work give the film a slick edge. But it is, John Hodge's tight screenplay and Danny Boyle's direction that superbly balances it all together. You want to see something entertaining but different, 'A Life Less Ordinary' could be the movie you're looking for. It had me laughing from start to end."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34627,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sve je izgubljeno
programme.desc: Nakon sudara s transportnim kontejnerom na moru, snalažljiv mornar (Robert Redford) nađe se, usprkos svim naporima, suočen s vlastitom smrtnošću. Drama o čovjeku (R. Redford) koji sam plovi Indijskim oceanom. Probudio ga je sudar s kontejnerskim brodom i spoznaja da njegov brod propušta vodu. K tome su onesposobljeni navigacijski uređaji i radio pa plovi ravno u oluju. Jedva preživi oluju i uz pomoć sekstanta i nautičkih karata pokušava nekako stići do prometnijeg dijela oceana s nadom da će sresti neki brod.

chicken,axe","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0331632/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"psi_fla"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"DOO THE RIGHT THING...","reviewBody":"...and keep this franchise going if you must, Warner Bros., but save it for the kids.

Rating: ** (out of *****)

Let's all rejoin Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang as they try and solve yet another mystery, but with REAL monsters! On second thoughts - let's not.

There is life left in the film world for Scooby-Doo. Honestly, I'm not joking. I acknowledge that the sequel isn't actually that good (I avoided the first one on critical advice) but it would be churlish for me to say it is unbearable. In fact, it's actually watchable to an extent. It's great to look at, and I'll admit to getting a reasonable number of laughs from it. 

 But I still can't recommend the film. It's too childish, doesn't know whether to take itself seriously or not, and above all, is just far too disjointed. Someone should've told the director that the way to approach a film like this is to play it for laughs the whole way through, and have a story that will, in some way, reach out to adults. This is more playground fare than family entertainment. And, on top of all that, it has the wooden Freddie Prinze Jr. as the lead, although thankfully not much is expected of him, or anyone in the cast. Still, blink and you'll miss a wasted Tim Blake Nelson. (You won't miss the latest American Idol, though...)

This is one for the cartoon's audience, children or anyone who's really, really bored and just needs a bit of a laugh. I'm sure it'll really amuse the kids both at home and in the cinema (believe me, nothing will be lost to DVD), although I can't see many of the general public wanting to watch the whole thing again."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51768,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

chicken,axe","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0331632/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"psi_fla","dateCreated":"2004-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"DOO THE RIGHT THING...","reviewBody":"...and keep this franchise going if you must, Warner Bros., but save it for the kids.

Rating: ** (out of *****)

Let's all rejoin Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang as they try and solve yet another mystery, but with REAL monsters! On second thoughts - let's not.

There is life left in the film world for Scooby-Doo. Honestly, I'm not joking. I acknowledge that the sequel isn't actually that good (I avoided the first one on critical advice) but it would be churlish for me to say it is unbearable. In fact, it's actually watchable to an extent. It's great to look at, and I'll admit to getting a reasonable number of laughs from it. 

 But I still can't recommend the film. It's too childish, doesn't know whether to take itself seriously or not, and above all, is just far too disjointed. Someone should've told the director that the way to approach a film like this is to play it for laughs the whole way through, and have a story that will, in some way, reach out to adults. This is more playground fare than family entertainment. And, on top of all that, it has the wooden Freddie Prinze Jr. as the lead, although thankfully not much is expected of him, or anyone in the cast. Still, blink and you'll miss a wasted Tim Blake Nelson. (You won't miss the latest American Idol, though...)

This is one for the cartoon's audience, children or anyone who's really, really bored and just needs a bit of a laugh. I'm sure it'll really amuse the kids both at home and in the cinema (believe me, nothing will be lost to DVD), although I can't see many of the general public wanting to watch the whole thing again.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51768,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

I liked the movie but throughout the first half, you get the feeling that there is something big coming up and you just can't wait till it does. The ending was quite satisfactory considering what happens.

The actors were all well chosen for the roles they portray. The bad guys led by the evil Capricorn fulfill their role as a motley crew. There is a hidden humor amongst them which does not bore. The CGI animations were very well done especially the magical creatures and alike.

Overall, I would say that if you like Stardust, you will enjoy this one. Although, Stardust is still better in my opinion.

programme.title: Davitelj protiv davitelja
Davitelj protiv davitelja
programme.desc:
Davitelj protiv davitelja: Directed by Slobodan Sijan. With Tasko Nacic, Nikola Simic, Srdjan Saper, Sonja Savic. A mentally disturbed flower seller starts killing young girls on the streets of Belgrade. While the frustrated police inspector is trying to stop him, an aspiring musician finds his life and work deeply intertwined with that of a killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087123/","name":"Davitelj protiv davitelja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk0YjgwMDQtZTU2Ny00ZTZkLWFlNWItOWJkMWI3ZmJkNzc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwMTIwODc@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0618705/","name":"Tasko Nacic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799509/","name":"Nikola Simic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764543/","name":"Srdjan Saper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797672/","name":"Slobodan Sijan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049004/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0657033/","name":"Nebojsa Pajkic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797672/","name":"Slobodan Sijan"}],"datePublished":"1984-06-18","description":"A mentally disturbed flower seller starts killing young girls on the streets of Belgrade. While the frustrated police inspector is trying to stop him, an aspiring musician finds his life and work deeply intertwined with that of a kil","keywords":"three word title,orchestra,conductor,strangling,bank","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087123/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"meddlecore"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's The Maniacs That Make A Metropolis!!!","reviewBody":"The citizens of Belgrade want their city to become a modern metropolis. But what makes a metropolis a metropolis, if not it's crime!? And not just any crime will qualify your beloved town, of course. Oh no. It's the maniacs that make a metropolis! 

This film, however, is first and foremost about misogyny...and you can't help but get your psychoanalysis on.

The opening sequence comes off as a light-hearted, less overtly disturbing, version of Alan Clarke's Elephant- as it details the varieties of crime that you can expect to find in the Serbian capital. Culminating with the introduction of our first strangler: Pera Mitic.

Pera is a sadistically coddled mama's boy with a carnation fetish. He wanders the town from pub to pub, attempting to sell his carnations to local lovers (albeit rather unsuccessfully).

However, not everyone is a fan of carnations...and he takes this very personally. Reject his offer with anti-carnation rhetoric, if you dare. Because, let's just say...as far as he's concerned- all haters must perish.

Finally! Belgrade can be considered a real, bonafide metropolis...all thanks to Pera!!! Word of the local serial strangler hits the airwaves, leaving the police to fear it will incite panic. However, unbeknownst to them...something much more sinister is afoot.

One of the locals taking in this broadcast is an up and coming nazi "punk" musician named Spiridon Kopicl (or Shpira, for short). Shpira also has misogynistic tendencies- arising from the angst directed at his father for marrying a younger woman after the death of his beloved mother.

When Shpira is exposed to the brutal reality of Pera's crimes through the TV, it induces a panic attack...and he starts to believe that he is spiritually connected to this unknown strangler. He finds that he is driven by the same compulsions as the strangler; thus, he starts to walk around town thinking of strangling the various women he happens upon in the street.

Shpira and his band even go as far as writing a song lauding the local strangler as a hero...complete with music video.

This gets the band some hype, and Shpira is asked to make a radio appearance. During his spot, the interviewer asks whether he, like the serial strangler, has urges to take his anger out on unsuspecting woman in such ways...leading to what was almost the world's first live broadcast strangulation.

This has the local police chief worried. He thinks that Shpira's concert will encourage others to engage in copycat crimes. So he tasks a legion of female officers (including one male officer in drag) to go undercover, and see if they can root out the real strangler(s) from the crowd.

--note: what kind of f*cked up music scene does Serbia have, that kids are proud to be nazi "punks" and bring confederate flags to their shows!?!-- 

(Anyways...)Pera keeps killing, while Shpira can't get himself taken seriously as strangler. Everyone is under the impression that it's all just a gimmick with him.

Meanwhile, the inspector is becoming more and more distraught after losing one of his friends and fellow officers to the strangler. He decides that he cannot go on. Ironically opting to hang himself (effectively strangulation). However, a last second intervention from his cat, George, gives him a change of heart: He decides that he must avenge the death of his friend; capture this demonic strangler; and secure his name in the annals of criminology once and for all.

A short time later, the local music station Rock-o-lada broadcasts a segment on Shpira's concert. Pera happens to be watching at the time, and sees himself on TV- as the host makes critical comments about the crowds' use of carnations to symbolize their support for the strangler. This acts as a trigger and sets him on a rampage- with one particular victim in his sights: the host of Rock-o-lada, Sofija.

Now...we have both the strangler and his apprentice on the prowl, after the same prey. Will the inspector manage to track them down and intervene before it's too late? Just when you think it's over....

What a brilliant dark comedy....and cult as f*ck!!! The whole thing is wonderfully shot; with great characters; and a clever TRIPLE twist at the end. Not to mention all the subtle humour it contains. 

It must also be noted that, content matter aside, it seems to act as a polemic against misogyny (as opposed to reinforcing it).

Both Pajkic and Sijan have done an excellent job on the screen writing and directorial fronts. The Pera character- and general style of the film- are reminiscent of the main character and style of Herz's masterpiece of horror: The Cremator.

This is an absolute must see. Unfortunately the available subtitles are kinda sh*t- so you'll have to read in a more proper anglicization as you watch. But that is my only beef...(well that and those f**king Nazi "punks")! 

9 out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3312,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="
